participant_1.background:
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
i am not very good at playing basketball.
My family is supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together.
My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
i eat tuna fish salad at least every day.

participant_2.background:
I like to collect Halloween toys and wear comfortable clothes.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.
i listen to country music.
my husband works at a telecom.
I take my iguana outside to bask in the sun.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! Just finished watching a nature documentary.
Oh that sounds nice! I love nature documentaries. What was it about?
It was about the migration of monarch butterflies. It was really interesting!
That sounds really cool! I've never seen one in real life!
Me neither! I would love to see one someday though.
Maybe we can go on a butterfly watching trip sometime!
That would be really fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! We'll make it happen!
Sounds good!
So what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to listen to techno music. It really gets me in the zone for my workouts.
Oh I love techno music too! It's so upbeat and energetic.
Right? It's the perfect music to get me moving.
What are some of your favorite songs?
I love "Harder Better Faster Stronger" by Daft Punk. It's such a classic.
That's a great song! I also love "Strobe" by Deadmau5.
Oh that's a good one too! We should start a music playlist together!
That would be so fun! I'd love to do that
